channel.title: Code that keep track of players mob kills, and more
channel.description:
I'm wondering if anyone wants to put some time together and make a code that can do this. Its not needed but its cool additions. Such as seeing ho far you've walked over all or how many mobs you've killed. Another idea is spells casted or arrows shot.
Well, I'm just throwing this idea out there. I'd love to have it, but it would be an interesting addition the the forum code snippet section thing.
